name: Sei Network
intro: Layer 1 blockchain with a built-in orderbook
introduce: Sei Network is a layer 1 blockchain built using the Cosmos SDK and Tendermint core, and features a built-in central limit orderbook (CLOB) module. Decentralized applications building on Sei can build on top of the CLOB, and other Cosmos-based blockchains can leverage Sei's CLOB as a shared liquidity hub and create markets for any asset.
